item.title: Nintendo Treehouse: Live broadcasts featuring Switch 2 games set for April 3 and 4
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/nintendo-treehouse-live-broadcasts-featuring-switch-2-games-set-for-april-3-and-4

  • Switch 2

Hands-on gameplay of games for Switch 2.

Nintendo will host “Nintendo Treehouse: Live – Nintendo Switch 2″ broadcasts on April 3, 2025 at 7:00 a.m. PT / 10:00 a.m. ET and April 4, 2025 at 7:00 a.m. PT / 10:00 a.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch them on YouTube.

The two broadcasts will feature hands-on gameplay of games for Switch 2.

The gameplay presentations will follow a Switch 2-focused Nintendo Direct on April 2 at 6:00 a.m. PT / 9:00 a.m. ET, which Nintendo has confirmed will run for approximately 60 minutes.

item.title: Sacre Bleu launches April 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/sacre-bleu-launches-april-17

  • PC
  • Switch

Hack-and-slash musketeer adventure game dated.

Side-scrolling hack-and-slash musketeer adventure game Sacre Bleu will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on April 17, publisher Noodlecake and developer Hildring Studio announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Noodlecake:

About

Sacre Bleu is a hack-and-slash musketeer adventure where you bust out of prison using a steampunk blunderbuss. Master bullet-time combat, steam-powered platforming and the best pretend French you’ll find anywhere!

Take on the role of captain of the French Musketeers who is thrown into the prison of la Bastille! On false charges, no less! You must hack-and-slash your way out aided by the brilliant inventor Josephine and her creation the steam-propelled-blunderbuss.

Use your blunderbuss and various arsenal of weapons to turn combat into an elegant, bullet-time, aerial-ballet. Hone your skills defeating enemies to achieve the highest combat grades. Doing so you’ll unlock even tougher levels to test your sword and skills.

Key Features

  • Fight Monstrous Bosses – Someone has turned the French aristocracy into giant bile-spewing zombies! Uncover a plot against France herself while the onion-soup thickens.
  • Explore la Bastille – The prison of la Bastille is vast! Explore the armory, sewers, and kitchens as you work to build an airship for your daring escape. On your journey you’ll find secrets tucked away in shadowy corners that unlock still further challenges.

item.title: Shohei Sato succeeds Yoshimi Yasuda as Dragami Games president and CEO
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/shohei-sato-succeeds-yoshimi-yasuda-as-dragami-games-president-and-ceo

Yasuda to step down as company director in June.

EXTREME founder, president, and CEO Shohei Sato has succeeded Yoshimi Yasuda as president and CEO of Dragami Games as of April 1, 2025, the company announced.

Sato previously served as representative executive vice president of Dragami Games, to which he was appointed in February 2025.

Yasuda will stay on board with Dragami Games as a company director until June, after which he plans to step down.
